st: Mana Ke Pyar Kisi Ka Mere Paas Nahi,
s:
Mana Ke Pyar Kisi Ka Mere Paas Nahi,
Magar Tunhein Meri Mohabbat Ka Ehsaas Nahi,

Jaane Pee Gaye Hum Kitne Gham E Aansu,
Ab Kuchh Aur Peene Ki Pyaas Nahi…

st: Pasand Karta Hun Har Haseeno Ko,
s:
Pasand Karta Hun Har Haseeno Ko,
Magar Dil Mein Basane Ke Liye Jagah Nahi,

Thukra Dete Hain Begane Samajhkar,
Uski Hoti Koi Thukraane Ki Vajah Nahi…

st: Kabhi Mohabbat Karo Toh Hum Se Karna,
s:
Kabhi Mohabbat Karo Toh Hum Se Karna,
Dil Ki Baat Juba Par Aaye Toh Hum Se Kahna,

Na Kah Sako Toh Aankhein Jhuka Lena,
Hum Samajh Jaayenge Hamein Kuchh Na Kahna…

st: Churakar Dil Toh Mera Woh Bekhabar Se Baithe Hain,
s:
Churakar Dil Toh Mera Woh Bekhabar Se Baithe Hain,
Milate Nahi Najar Nahi Humse Woh Chat Par Aan Baithe Hain,

Dekh Kar Humko Kitab Se Mooh Chhipakar Baithe Hain,
Unhein Khud Nahi Maalum Ki Woh Kya Kar Baithe Hain…

st: Mere Dil Mein Na Aao Varna Doob Jaaoge,
s:
Mere Dil Mein Na Aao Varna Doob Jaaoge,
Gham E Ashkon Ke Shiwa Kuchh Bhi Nahi Andar,

Agar Ek Bar Risne Laga Jo Paani,
Toh Kam Pad Jaayega Bharne Ke Liye Samander…

st: Mera Sahara Toh Sharab Ka Pyala Hai,
s:
Mera Sahara Toh Sharab Ka Pyala Hai,
Jakhmon Ne Mujhe Dard Dekar Pala Hai,

Thokar Marker Giraya Khusi Ne Mujhe,
Toh Haath Badhakar Ghamon Ne Sambhala Hai…

st: Har Khusi Ke Pahlu Haaton Se Chhut Gaye,
s:
Har Khusi Ke Pahlu Haaton Se Chhut Gaye,
Ab Toh Khud Ke Saaye Bhi Rooth Gaye,

Haalat Hain Aise Zindagi Mein Hamari,
Pyar Ki Rahon Mein Hum Bilkul Toot Gaye…

st: Bebas Hai Dil Beraham Hain Niganein,
s:
Bebas Hai Dil Beraham Hain Niganein,
Marne Se Pahle Thaam Lena Meri Baahein,

Fir Maalum Nahi Manzil Mile Na Mile,
Sambhal Kar Chalna Kanton Bhari Hain Raahein…

st: Gilas Par Gilas Tutate Rahe ,
s:
Gilas Par Gilas Tutate Rahe ,
Ghamon Ne Khusi Ka Pyala Bharne Na Diya,

Masalon Ki Tarah Dil Jalte Rahe,
Badkismati Ne Ujala Karne Na Diya…

st: Phir Se Woh Sapna Sajane Chala Hun,
s:
Phir Se Woh Sapna Sajane Chala Hun,
Umeedon Ke Sahare Dil Lagane Chala Hun,

Anzaam To Mera Bura Hi Hoga,
Phir Bhi Tumhe Apna Banane Chala Hun…

st: Laakh Bandisen Laga Le Duniya Hum Par,
s:
Laakh Bandisen Laga Le Duniya Hum Par,
Magar Dil Par Kaabu Nahi Kar Payenge,

Woh Lamha Aakhiri Hoga Zeevan Ka Hamara,
Jis Din Hum Yaar Tujhe Bhul Jayenge….

st: Laakh Bandisen Laga Le Duniya Hum Par,
s:
Laakh Bandisen Laga Le Duniya Hum Par,
Magar Dil Par Kaabu Nahi Kar Payenge,

Woh Lamha Aakhiri Hoga Zeevan Ka Hamara,
Jis Din Hum Yaar Tujhe Bhul Jayenge….

st: Maine Bhi Dil Ka Dard Bayan Kiya Hai,
s:
Maine Bhi Dil Ka Dard Bayan Kiya Hai,
Khusi Ka Har Lamha Tere Naam Kiya Hai,

Dekho Jara Yeh Mera Bigda Hua Mukaddar,
Kismat Ne Har Jagah Naakam Kiya Hai….

st: Baar Baar Dil Par Jakham Kab Tak Sahun Main,
s:
Baar Baar Dil Par Jakham Kab Tak Sahun Main,
Sah Sahkar Yeh Sitam Kab Tak Chup Rahu Main,

Jaante Hain Zamane Waale Mere Halat Sabhi,
Chahiye Jakhmon Ki Dawa Yeh Kis Se Kahun Main….

st: Hamesha…..
s:
Hamesha…..

Dil Dekhta Hai Tumhe Sapno Mein,
Dil Kahta Hai Tumhe Sapno Mein,

Dil Mahsoos Karta Hai Sapno Mein,
Dil Bichhadta Hai Sapno Mein,

Dil Rota Hai Sapno Mein,
Kis Din Yeh Dil Na Dhadka Sapno Mein,

Bas Tumhare Liye….

st: Dil Se Tera Pyar Hoga Kam Nahi,
s:
Dil Se Tera Pyar Hoga Kam Nahi,
Tum Bewafa Huve Toh Kya, Aur Ek Gham Sahi,

Aapka Faisla Aapke Karm Karenge,
Sab Kuchh Milega Tumhe Magar Honge Hum Nahi…..

st: Pal Bhar Ke Liye Agar Woh Hamein Apna Bana Le,
s:
Pal Bhar Ke Liye Agar Woh Hamein Apna Bana Le,
Aapne Zeevan Ka Agar Woh Sapna Bana Le,

Phir Bhale Hi Woh Mera Dil Tod De,
Bus Is Raat Ke Liye Woh Mujhe Sajna Bana Le…..

st: Har Aag Bujh Jati Hai Barsat Mein,
s:
Har Aag Bujh Jati Hai Barsat Mein,
Magar Dil Ki Aag Na Bujh Saki,

Aansu Ka Paani Girta Raha,
Phir Bhi Dekho Yahan Jalti Rahi…..

st: Zindagi Bahut Kuch Sikhati Hai,
s:
Zindagi Bahut Kuch Sikhati Hai,
Kabhi Hasati Hai Kabhi Rulati Hai,
Khud Se Bhi Jyada Kisi Par Vishwash Mat Karna,
Kyuki Andhere Mein To Parchai Bhi Saath Chod Jati Hai…

st: Dil Ki Awaz Koi Pehchanta Nahi,
s:
Dil Ki Awaz Koi Pehchanta Nahi,
Kisko Kya Dard Hai Koi Janta Nahi,
Hum Bhi Nahi Chahte Aapko Pareshan Karna,
Magar Kya Kare Dil Hai Ki Manta Nahi…

st: Dil Se Aapka Khayal Jata Nahi,
s:
Dil Se Aapka Khayal Jata Nahi,
Aapke Siva Koi Yaad Aata Nahi,

Ji Chahta Ki Aapko Roj Dekhu Par,
Wo Waqt Kabhi Aata Nahi…

st: Dosti Mein Dooriyan To Aati Rehti Hain,
s:
Dosti Mein Dooriyan To Aati Rehti Hain,
Phir Bhi Dosti Dilo Ko Mila Deti Hai,

Wo Dost Hi Kya Jo Naraz Na Ho,
Per Sachi Dosti Dosto Ko Mana Leti Hai…

st: Hasi Ke Raste Pe Chala Karo,
s:
Hasi Ke Raste Pe Chala Karo,
Khushiyo Ki Mahak Liya Karo,

Pyar Se Dilon Ko Chuha Karo,
Jahan Tumhe Gum Nazar Aaye,

Is Nacheez Ko Yaad Kiya Karo,
Har Kali Tujhse Khushboo Udhar Mange,

Aftab Tujhse Noor Udhar Mange,
Rab Kare Tu Dosti Aisi Nibhaye Ki Log Teri Dosti Udhar Mange…

st: Dekh Meri Aankho Mein Khawab Kiske Hai,
s:
Dekh Meri Aankho Mein Khawab Kiske Hai,
Dill Me Mere Sulagte Toofan Kis Ke Hai,

Nahi Guzra Koi Aaj Tak Is Raaste Se Ho Kar,
Phir Ye Kadmo Ke Nishaan Kiske Hai…

st: Mann Mein Sabka Armaan Nahi Hota,
s:
Mann Mein Sabka Armaan Nahi Hota,
Har Koi Dill Ka Mehamaan Nahi Hota,
Par Ek Baar Dill Me Sama Jaye Use ,
Bhulana Aasaan Nahi Hota…

st: Dil To Unke Sine Mai Bhi Machalta Hoga,
s:
Dil To Unke Sine Mai Bhi Machalta Hoga,
Hushn Bhi So-So Rang Badalta Hoga,
Uthti Hongi Jab Nigahein Unki,
Khud Khuda Bhi Gir-Gir Ke Sambhalta Hoga…

st: Khamoshiyan Teri Mujhse Baatein Karti Hai,
s:
Khamoshiyan Teri Mujhse Baatein Karti Hai,
Meri Har Aah Har Dard Samajhti Hain,
Pata Hai Majbur Hai Tu Bhi Aur Main Bhi,
Phir Bhi Aankhein Tere Deedar Ko Tarasti Hain…

st: Ret Pe Naam Kabhi Likhte Nahin,
s:
Ret Pe Naam Kabhi Likhte Nahin,
Kyonki Ret Pe Naam Kabhi Tikte Nahin,

Aap Kahte Ho Tum Patthar Dil Ho ,
Par Patthar Pe Likhe Naam Kabhi Mit Te Nahin…

st: Zikar Huaa Jab Khuda Ki Rehmaton Ka,
s:
Zikar Huaa Jab Khuda Ki Rehmaton Ka,
Hamne Khud Ko Khushnaseeb Paya,

Tamanna Thi Ek Pyare Se Dost Ki,
Khuda Khud Dost Bankar Chala Aaya…

st: Dil Ka Rishta Hai Hamara
s:
Dil Ka Rishta Hai Hamara
Dil Ke Kone Mein Naam Hai Tumhara
Har Yaad Mein Hai Chehra Tumhara
Hum Sath Nhi To Kya Hua
Zindagi Bhar Pyar Nibhane Ka Wada Hai Hamara…

st: Unse Door Bhala Hum Kaise Reh Pate
s:
Unse Door Bhala Hum Kaise Reh Pate
Dil Se Unhe Kaise Bhula Pate
Kaash Ki Woh Sanso Ke Illava Aayine Mein Bhi Hote
Khud Ko Bhi Dekhte To Woh Nazar Aate…

st: Is Nazar Ko Tera Intezaar Rehta Hai
s:
Is Nazar Ko Tera Intezaar Rehta Hai
Dil Tumse Milne Ko Beqaraar Hota Hai
Tum Hamse Milo Na Milo
Phir Bhi is Dil Main Teri Dosti Ka Pyar Rehta Hai…

st: Nikalte Hai Aansoo Job Mulakat Nahi Hoti
s:
Nikalte Hai Aansoo Job Mulakat Nahi Hoti
Toot Jata Hai Dil Jab Bai Nahi Hoti
Teri Jaan Ki Kasam A Dost
Jab Tu Yad Na Aye
Aisi Koi Shaam Nahi Hoti…

st: Jab Koi Khayal Dil Se Takrata Hai
s:
Jab Koi Khayal Dil Se Takrata Hai
Dil Na Chah Kar Bhi Khamosh Rahe Jata Hai
Koi Sab Kuch Kehkar Dosti Jatata Hai
To Koi Kuch Na Keh Kar Bhi Dosti Nibhata Hai…

st: Mayush To Hun Vaade Se Tere
s:
Mayush To Hun Vaade Se Tere
Khuch Aas Nahi Aur Aas Bhi Hai

Main Apne Khayalon Ke Sadke
Tu Paas Nahi Aur Paas Bhi Hai

Dil Ne To Khushi Mangi Thi
Magar Jo Tune Diya Achha Hi Diya

Jis Dil Ko Talluq Ho Tujhse
Wo Raas Nahi Aur Raas Bhi Hai

Palkon Se Girte Ashkon Me
Tasveer Jhlakti Hai Teri

Deedar Ki Pyassi Aakhon Me
Ab Pyass Nhi Aur Pyass Bhi Hai

st: Raaste Chalna Hamein Hain Sikhate,
s:
Raaste Chalna Hamein Hain Sikhate,
Hum Hain Ke Raaste Hain Bhool Jaate,

Humko Manzil Tak Hain Pahunchate,
Aur Hum Unhe Pichhe Hai Chhod Aate….

st: Dil Todne Se Toh Achha Tha,
s:
Dil Todne Se Toh Achha Tha,
Pyar Ka Izhaar Hi Na Karte,

Khud Ko Bad Kismat Samajh Kar,
Hum Apni Kismat Par Hi Ro Lete….

st: Abke Baras Woh Nahi Aaye Bahar Mein,
s:
Abke Baras Woh Nahi Aaye Bahar Mein,
Gujrega Ab Ek Baras Intezar Mein,

Tute Dil Mein Teri Mohabbat Tera Khyal,
Khush Rang Ho Bahar Ke Gujri Bahar Mein….

st: Chand Lamhe Hamein Pyar Ke Udhar De De,
s:
Chand Lamhe Hamein Pyar Ke Udhar De De,
Ki Marne Se Pahle Hamein Jhuta Karar De De,

Kuchh Der Hi Teri Yaad Mere Dil Se Mit Jaaye,
Yahi Soch Kar Tu Thoda Sa Sharab De De….

st: Junun E Iahq,
s:
Junun E Iahq,
Nahi Raas Aaya Hamein,

Jab Bhi Dekha Aaina,
Aks Unka Hi Najar Aaya Hamein,

Tadpate Dil Ke Byaan Karein Kaise ?

Jab Bhi Kureda Ghavo Ko,
Dard Unka Hi Ubhar Aaya…

st: Koi Pathar Se Na Maare Mere Deevane Ko,
s:
Koi Pathar Se Na Maare Mere Deevane Ko,
Koi Pather Se Na Maare Mere Deevane Ko,
.
.
.
.
.
.
Nuclear Power Ka Zamana Hai,
Bom Se Uda Do Saale Ko….

st: Pani Aane Ki Baat Karte Ho,
s:
Pani Aane Ki Baat Karte Ho,
Dil Jalane Ki Baat Karte Ho,

Char Din Se Muh Nahi Dhoya,
Tum Nahane Ki Baat Karte Ho….

st: Mere Dil Ko Tamanna Hai Abhi Bhi,
s:
Mere Dil Ko Tamanna Hai Abhi Bhi,
Mera Yaar Jakham Mujhko De Jaaye,

Kuchh Khusiyan Rakhi Hain Sambhal Maine,
Woh Aakar Mujh Se Toh Le Jaaye…

st: Koi Kisi Ka Nahi Hai Jag Mein,
s:
Koi Kisi Ka Nahi Hai Jag Mein,
Yeh Riste Naate Yaaro Sab Jhute Hain,

Jab Girte Hain Badal Ghamon Mein Tab,
Sab Bandhan Ek Pal Mein Toote Hain…

st: Kya Lena Mujhko Duniya Se,
s:
Kya Lena Mujhko Duniya Se,
Mujhe Tujhse Hi Bas Kaam Hai,

Tere Dil Ki Mujhko Khabar Nahi,
Mere Dil Mein Bas Tera Naam Hai…

st: Woh Mujhko Rulakar Hans Diya,
s:
Woh Mujhko Rulakar Hans Diya,
Mera Dil Thukrakar Hans Diya,

Meri Jholi Bhar Kar Kaanto Se,
Mujhe Paas Bithakar Hans Diya…

st: Hasrat Sirf Tumhe Paane Ki,
s:
Hasrat Sirf Tumhe Paane Ki,
Aur Koi Khwaish Nahi Is Parwane Ki,

Gham Ki Aandhi Aisi Chali, Hum Tum Bichhud Gaye,
Aansu Bhi Apne Puchhne Lage, Aapke Saathi Kidhar Gaye…

st: Aitbaar Tum Par Kya Karte,
s:
Aitbaar Tum Par Kya Karte,
Pyar Tumse Kya Karte,

Kadar Nahi Tumhe Pyar Ki,
Ikrar Tumse Kya Karte…

st: Jara Si Roshni Ke Waste Hum Yaaro,
s:
Jara Si Roshni Ke Waste Hum Yaaro,
Dekhiye Apna Hi Ghar Jalaye Baithe Hain,

Shayad Khuda Ne Bhi Fer Li Aankhein Humse,
Sunta Nahi Muddato Se Haath Uthaye Baithe Hain….

st: Agar Jaate, Tum Se Dil Na Lagate,
s:
Agar Jaate, Tum Se Dil Na Lagate,
Ki Majhdar Mein Chhod Jaoge Hamein,

Yeh Dil Aaj Tak Bhi Nahi Manta,
Ki Auron Ki Tarah Rulaoge Hamein…..

st: Is Kadar Dil Ko Dukhana Achha Nahi Hota,
s:
Is Kadar Dil Ko Dukhana Achha Nahi Hota,
Har Kisi Se Yun Dil Ko Lagana Achha Nahi Hota,

Kuchh Riste Hote Hain Aise Jinme Behtar Hai Dooriyan,
Itna Bhi Kisi Ke Paas Jana Achha Nahi Hota…

st: Hum Pyar Aapse Karte Hain Dil O Jaan Se Sanam,
s:
Hum Pyar Aapse Karte Hain Dil O Jaan Se Sanam,
Is Baat Ka Aapko Aitbaar Kyu Nahi Aata,

Na Jaane Kaisa Pather Hai Yeh Dil Bhi Aapka,
Aap Ko Hum Par Kabhi Bhi Pyar Kyu Nahi Hota…

st: Huyi Toh Hai Yeh Khata Humse Bahut Bhari Sanam,
s:
Huyi Toh Hai Yeh Khata Humse Bahut Bhari Sanam,
Na Chahte Huye Bhi Hum Aapse Pyar Kar Baithe,
Roka Tha Humein Sab Ne Ki Na Kar Tu Sagar,
Na Jaane Fir Bhi Kyu Tera Aitbaar Kar Baithe….

st: Mujhko Rulakar Woh Bhi Roya Toh Hoga Yaaro,
s:
Mujhko Rulakar Woh Bhi Roya Toh Hoga Yaaro,
Muh Ashko Se Usne Bhi Dhoya Toh Hoga Yaaro,
Agar Na Kiya Hai Kuchh Hasil Hamne Pyar Mein,
Kuchh Na Kuchh Usne Bhi Khoya Toh Hoga Yaaro….

st: Unki Yaadon Ko Abhi Bhi Seene Mein Chhupaye Baitha Hun,
s:
Unki Yaadon Ko Abhi Bhi Seene Mein Chhupaye Baitha Hun,
Haay Main Kis Jaalim Se Dil Ko Lagaye Baitha Hun,
Inhi Raahon Se Aayenge, Bhale Hi, Baad Mere Marne Ke,
Kitna Nadan Hun Abhi Bhi Dil Ko Samjhaye Baitha Hun…

st: Mujhko Rulane Se Milta Hai Sabko Na Jaane Kya,
s:
Mujhko Rulane Se Milta Hai Sabko Na Jaane Kya,
Na Jaane Kyu Us Khuda Ko Bhi Raham Aata Nahi,
Maine Kabhi Bhi Na Ki Sikayat, Bhale Hi Laakh Gham Mile,
Magar Mere Moulal Sagar Se Ab Aut Jiya Jata Nahi…

st: Yeh Manta Hun Main, Ki Har Koi Bewafa Nahi Hota,
s:
Yeh Manta Hun Main, Ki Har Koi Bewafa Nahi Hota,
Magar Teri Tarah Har Koi Sab Kuchh Toh Nahi Khota,
Yeh Bhi Sach Hai Ki Agar Mujhko Gham Nahi Milte,
Toh Is Duniya Mein Shayad Yeh Sagar Nahi Hota…

st: Woh Khwabo Mein Aakar Rulate Hain,
s:
Woh Khwabo Mein Aakar Rulate Hain,
Hakikat Mein Na Aakar Tadpaate Hain,
Jinko Hum Samjhaya Karte The Kabhi,
Woh Log Aaj Humko Samjhate Hain…

st: Hamin Jaante Hain Ke Kaise Khuda Se,
s:
Hamin Jaante Hain Ke Kaise Khuda Se,
Tujhe Manga Hai Humne Eh Yaar Mere,
Teri Judai Ab Main Sahunga Nahi,
Sada Kareeb Rahna Dilbar Mere…

st: Na Dil Hota Na Lagate Yaaro,
s:
Na Dil Hota Na Lagate Yaaro,
Yeh Jeevan Hans Kar Bitate Yaaro,
Hansane Par Aa Jaate Hain Aansu,
Hamein Aise Toh Na Tadpaate Yaaro…

st: Raat Ki Tanhai Dasti Hai,
s:
Raat Ki Tanhai Dasti Hai,
Yaar Ki Bewafayi Hasti Hai,
Pyar Mein Mila Jo Tohfa Ise,
Sagar Ko Woh Ruswayi Dasti Hai….

st: Bhale Bhool Jana Aap Hamein,
s:
Bhale Bhool Jana Aap Hamein,
Hum Aapko Bhool Na Paayenge,
Aapka Hi Saath Mangenge Sada,
Hum Jab Bhi Jahan Mein Aayenge…

st: Bhool Jana Yaaro Itna Aasan Nahi Hota,
s:
Bhool Jana Yaaro Itna Aasan Nahi Hota,
Jakhmon Ke Nishan Mitana Itna Aasan Nahi Hota,
Jisne Mana Ho Yaar Ko Barabar Rab Ke,
Usko Yun Chhod Jana Aasan Nahi Hota….

st: Aapko Bhulane Ki Koshish Kar Raha Hun,
s:
Aapko Bhulane Ki Koshish Kar Raha Hun,
Varna Baad Mein Mujhko Hi Gham Rahega,
Aapko Toh Laakhon Hai Sahare Duniya Ke,
Baad Aapke Hamein Apna Kon Kahega….

st: Jaane Kya Kami Hai Ham Mein Yarab,
s:
Jaane Kya Kami Hai Ham Mein Yarab,
Jaane Kyu Sab Humse Khafa Rahte Hain,
Humne Toh Chaha Banana Sab Ko Apna,
Jaane Kyu Sab Humse Juda Rahte Hain…

st: Thodi Si Toh Akal Seekh Le Tu Bhi Pagal,
s:
Thodi Si Toh Akal Seekh Le Tu Bhi Pagal,
Jaane Waale Ko Peechhe Se Bulaya Nahi Karte,
Ban Jaate Hai Naasur Ek Vakt Ke Baad,
Dil Ke Jakhmon Ko Yu Sahlaya Nahi Karte…

st: Mulakat Toh Huyi Thi Unse Ek Roj Magar,
s:
Mulakat Toh Huyi Thi Unse Ek Roj Magar,
Hum Haal E Dil Unko Apna Sunate Kaise,
Hamari Takdeer Mein Hi Likha Hai Rona Magar,
Unko Dikhakar Jakham Apne Hum Rulate Kaise….

st: Jabse Dekha Hai Najron Ne Aapko,
s:
Jabse Dekha Hai Najron Ne Aapko,
Inko Aur Kuchh Bhi Najar Nahi Aata,
Na Jaane Kaisa Kiya Hai Jaadu Aapne,
Koi Aur Chehra Isko Nahi Bhata….

st: Mere Dil Mein Rahna Tum Oh Sanam,
s:
Mere Dil Mein Rahna Tum Oh Sanam,
Kya Karna Is Char Deewari Ka,
Bas Hum Jee Lenge Ek Dooje Ke Liye,
Chhod Denge Is Duniya Sari Ko….

st: Teri Har Ada Mein Koi Baat Hai,
s:
Teri Har Ada Mein Koi Baat Hai,
Main Deewana Sa Hua Jaata Hun,
Har Kisi Mein Dekhta Hun Tumko,
Khud Se Begana Hua Jata Hun…

st: Kis Baat Ka Marham Denge Yaar,
s:
Kis Baat Ka Marham Denge Yaar,
Jab Haal Hamara Na Jaane Koi,
Sab Dekhte Hain Upri Dikhave Ko Hi,
Mere Dil Ka Dard Na Pahchane Koi…

st: Dekho Yaaro Hamein Aawaj Na Dena,
s:
Dekho Yaaro Hamein Aawaj Na Dena,
Hum Na Wapas Kabhi Aa Paayenge,
Us Din Manana Yaaro Id Tum,
Jab Hum Duniya Se Chale Jaayenge…

st: Na Jaane Eh Dost Kis Baat Ne Tujhko,
s:
Na Jaane Eh Dost Kis Baat Ne Tujhko,
Zindagi Mein Apni Itna Magrur Kar Diya,
Yeh Bhi Aapka Julm Hai Jo Dekar Ke Kasam,
Sagar Ko Jeene Ke Liye Majboor Kar Diya…

st: Agar Aapne Mukh Fer Liya Humse,
s:
Agar Aapne Mukh Fer Liya Humse,
Toh Eh Dost Humse Nasiba Rooth Jaayega,
Humse Na Sahi Jaayegi Yeh Berukhi Aapki,
Sagar Ka Dil Hai Naajuk Toot Jaayega…

st: Hum Na Kah Paayenge Kisi Se Bhi,
s:
Hum Na Kah Paayenge Kisi Se Bhi,
Aap Humse Hamari Kahani Na Puchhiye,
Hum Na Rok Paayenge Aaankho Se Ashk,
Aap Hamin Se Hamari Jubani Na Puchhiye…

st: Baad Unke Jeene Ki Tamanna Hi Nahi,
s:
Baad Unke Jeene Ki Tamanna Hi Nahi,
Mere Moula Tu Apne Paas Bula Le Mujhko,
Mujhse Sahi Nahi Jaati Unki Berukhi,
Tu Apni God Mein Ab Sula Le Humko….

st: Tu Kahe Jo Bhi Woh Karunga Main,
s:
Tu Kahe Jo Bhi Woh Karunga Main,
Tu Udas Na Ho Tere Paas Hun Main,
Kya Karna Hai Kisi Aur Ka Sang,
Tere Saath Sanam Din Raat Hun Main….

st: Dekh, Bhar Gaya Hai, Tera Diya Jakham Fir Se,
s:
Dekh, Bhar Gaya Hai, Tera Diya Jakham Fir Se,
Aaj Mukuraya Hun, Rulane Ke Liye Aaja,

Tukde Samete Hain Sagar Ne Fir Se Dil Ke,
Aur Nahi Toh Thokar Lagane Ke Liye Aaja…

st: Tujhe Kaise Bataun Ke Bin Tere,
s:
Tujhe Kaise Bataun Ke Bin Tere,
Main Kitna Tanha Ho Jata Hun,

Dil Har Pal Rota Rahta Hai,
Main Samjha Isko Nahi Pata Hun…

st: Abhi Abhi Toh Aaye Ho Eh Mere Hamdam,
s:
Abhi Abhi Toh Aaye Ho Eh Mere Hamdam,
Aur Abhi Jaane Ki Baat Karte Ho,

Yeh Kaisi Hai Sanam Mohabbat Aapki,
Aap Dil Dukhane Ki Baat Karte Ho….

st: Zindagi Ko So Baar Aajmaya Hai Humne,
s:
Zindagi Ko So Baar Aajmaya Hai Humne,
Har Baar Mout Ko Hi Kareeb Paya Hai Humne,

Chot Khane Se Kab Baaj Aate Hain Hum Bhi,
Toote Dil Ko Aaj Fir Lagaya Hai Hamne…

st: Kaise Bhulaya Jata Hai Dil Se Kisi Ko,
s:
Kaise Bhulaya Jata Hai Dil Se Kisi Ko,
Kaash Yeh Ada Aap Hamein Bhi Sikha Dete,

Agar Yun Chhod Kar Jana Tha Toh Kah Toh Dete,
Hum Aapki Raahon Mein Palkein Bichha Dete….

st: Sab Matlab Se Nata Rakhte Hain,
s:
Sab Matlab Se Nata Rakhte Hain,
Matlab Nikalte Hi Chhod Dete Hain,

Samjhate Hain Dil Ko Khilona Koi,
Khel Kar Fir Ise Tod Dete Hain….

st: Tere Sahar Tera Naam Kyu Teri Baatein Yaad Rakhun,
s:
Tere Sahar Tera Naam Kyu Teri Baatein Yaad Rakhun,
Jo Hamne Ki Thi Tumse Kyu Mulakatein Yaad Rakhu,

Dil Ko Mere Todkar Ghamon Ka Sagar Hai Kiya,
Jo Saath Thi Gujari Kyun Barsaatein Yaad Rakhun…

st: Jeevan Mein Bas Aap Se Hi Pyaar Kiya Tha,
s:
Jeevan Mein Bas Aap Se Hi Pyaar Kiya Tha,
Aapse Hi Toh Mohabbt Ka Izhaar Kiya Tha,

Agar Chhodna Tha Yun Hi Toh Inkar Kar Dete,
Tab Toh Aapne Bhi Dil Se Ikrar Kiya Tha….

st: Tu Bhi Hai Sangdil Bewafa Eh Dost,
s:
Tu Bhi Hai Sangdil Bewafa Eh Dost,
Yeh Sochkar Dil Ghabrata Hai,

Ab Karun Bhi Kya Ke Bin Tere,
Sagar Se Jiya Nahi Jata Hai…

st: Na Chalta Hai Dil Par Jor Koi,
s:
Na Chalta Hai Dil Par Jor Koi,
Yeh Khud Ki Hi Marji Chalata Hai,

Karta Hai Khatayein Kaisi Kaisi,
Aur Badle Mein Hamein Rulata Hai…

st: Main Aur Kuchh Bhi Soch Pata Hi Nahi,
s:
Main Aur Kuchh Bhi Soch Pata Hi Nahi,
Din Raat Rahta Hai Bas Khyal Aapka,

Kya Hum Nibha Payenge Apni Kasmon Ko,
Dil Mein Ubharta Hai Bas Sawal Aapka…

st: Ek Apni Hi Baat Kya Main Karu,
s:
Ek Apni Hi Baat Kya Main Karu,
Tune Kitno Ke Jaane Dil Tode Hain,

Magar Humse Nahi Hoga Sahan Kabhi,
Sagar Ke Din Ab Toh Thode Hain…

st: Kaash Hamara Bhi Hota Dost Koi,
s:
Kaash Hamara Bhi Hota Dost Koi,
Hamara Jaadu Bhi Kisi Par Chal Pata,

Kabhi Mujhko Bhi Deta Moula Himaat,
Yeh Sagar Bhi Dil Ki Kah Pata…

st: Aisi Kardi Hai Tumne Meri Halat Yarab,
s:
Aisi Kardi Hai Tumne Meri Halat Yarab,
Haal E Dil Kisi Ko Suna Na Paaunga,

Tujhse Kiya Hai Wada Tabhi Majboor Hun,
Isi Liye Khud Ko Main Mita Na Paaunga…

st: Jab Bhi Girti Hai Ye Boonde Dharti Per
s:
Jab Bhi Girti Hai Ye Boonde Dharti Per
Mere Dil Mai Ek Aas Hoti Hai,

Jab Bhi Girti Hai Ye Boonde Patto Per,
Mere Dil Ko Tera Ahsas Hota Hai,

Dil Me Tufan Sa Mach Jata Hai,
Jab Tu Door Ho Or Barsat Hoti Ha…

st: Kyon Mere Dil Ko Diye Hain Jakham Aapne,
s:
Kyon Mere Dil Ko Diye Hain Jakham Aapne,
Kyon Mere Pyar Ko Aapne Aise Bhula Diya,

Wada Toh Kiya Tha Saath Nibhane Ka Magar,
Kyun Sagar Ko Fir Aise Hai Daga Diya…

st: Apne Aap Kpo Toh Hum Samjha Lenge,
s:
Apne Aap Kpo Toh Hum Samjha Lenge,
Magar Dil Mera Yeh Manta Hi Nahi,

Humne Toh Dekhi Hai Bewafayi Aapki,
Aap Bewafa Ho Dil Jaanta Hi Nahi….

st: Hamne Na Jana Tha Yeh Aaj Tak Kabhi,
s:
Hamne Na Jana Tha Yeh Aaj Tak Kabhi,
Ki Koi Raah Mein Aise Bhi Chhod Deta Hai,

Koi Apne Dil Ko Bahlane Ke Baad,
Dusre Ke Dil Ko Aise Tod Deta Hai…

st: Woh Bholi Bhali Si Surat Unki,
s:
Woh Bholi Bhali Si Surat Unki,
Hum Bhool Bhi Toh Nahi Paaate Hain,

Jab Bhi Yaad Aa Jaaye Unki Kabhi,
Hamee Jaante Hain Dil Ko Kaise Samjhate Hain,

st: Woh Itne Hasee Honge Eh Mere Dosto,
s:
Woh Itne Hasee Honge Eh Mere Dosto,
Dil Ko Is Baat Ka Yakee Aata Nahi,

Ab Toh Unko Paane Ki Chahat Ho Gayi,
Unke Bina Ab Kuchh Bhata Nahi…

st: Shayad Na Rahi Ab Aapko Jarurat Hamari,
s:
Shayad Na Rahi Ab Aapko Jarurat Hamari,
Isiliye Ab Aapne Humko Chhod Diya,

Jab Tha Jee Chaha, Toh Khele Is Dil Se,
Aur Ab Jab Jee Bhar Gaya Toh Ise Tod Diya…

st: Koi Bhi Nahi Yahan Par Apna Hota,
s:
Koi Bhi Nahi Yahan Par Apna Hota,
Is Duniya Ne Yeh Sikhya Hai Humko,

Uski Bewafayi Ka Na Charcha Karna,
Aaj Dil Ne Yeh Samjhaya Hai Humko…

st: Main Jeeta Raha Hun Ghut Ghut Ke Yaaro,
s:
Main Jeeta Raha Hun Ghut Ghut Ke Yaaro,
Mujhe Ab Jeene Ki Tamanna Nahi Hai,

Yeh Jo Humne Kiya Hai Pyar Tumse,
Yeh Dil Ki Lagi Hai Dilaagi Nahii Hai…
